name: Business Duck (journolud)
description:
Business Duck

Use your ability to manipulate time (Time only moves when you do) to steal one of the golden brief cases and escape through the portal.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Pick up weapon - E
  • Add passive item to slot 1 - 1
  • Add passive item to slot 2 - 2

Passive Items

  • Beer - Shoot twice as many bullets per shot
  • Dice - Multiply number of shots by anything from 0 - 3
  • Shield - 50% chance of blocking enemy bullet
  • Energy drink - Increased speed
  • Monocle - Increased accuracy
  • Hammer - Your bullets will destroy enemy bullets on contact

Picking up the sniper allows greater vision whilst pikcing up the LMG slows you down.

Timer in the top left shows how long you've been active during the current run.
